body.p: My friend Saml Bernard Esqr has an application to make for a client of his who has been unfortunate enough to be fined for a violation of some of the penal laws of this State.

I know nothing of the merits of the application but take pleasure in saying that you may rely with confidence upon what Mr Bernard may say to you in relation thereto; and any civilities of kindness which you may show or extend to him will be gratfully remembered by him and

very truly
yr friend
H. J. Stites
